EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Dennis, Carl Puckett Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (1369949373.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- Standard Template - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Dennis, I wanted to follow up on the email below and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BYuE5W6POUIaj%2Bi3vOf4zC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BYuE5W6POUIaj%2Bi3vOf4zC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Friday, May 17, 2013 12:38 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Dennis, Carl Puckett Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners To view this email as a web page, click here <http://info.mbopartners.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57ewoWaC2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLjNMa5w17gIWRQ%3D> Dear Dennis, Hello Dennis: Ive been using MBO for some time and thought you might be interested in their services too. Check them out when you get a second. - Carl Carl Puckett We received your contact information from Carl Puckett, a current member of MBO Partners who believes you could greatly benefit from our program. My name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor, and I invite you to learn what MBO Partners is all about <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Carl%20Puckett&re=Dennis>, and decide for yourself. For more than 25 years, our company has led the independent consulting sector in America. Our mission is simple we make it easy for independent consultants and their clients to work together by handling the administrative, financial, legal, tax and expense burdens that bog down consultants, thus increasing their billable time. In addition, we provide them access to the largest exclusive online community of successful independent consultants, the clients that engage with them, and a multitude of valuable resources. Click here <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=Carl%20Puckett&re=Dennis> to learn more about what MBO Partners can do for independent consultants. Here are some recent tools we have developed to empower our consultants to thrive in their independent careers that you might find useful: - Bill Rate Packet <http://www.mbopartners.com/billrate>  Not sure what to bill your clients? This tool will assist you, factoring in your desired profit margins, expected expenses, and projected insurance costs. - Webinar Index <http://info.mbopartners.com/SeriesSign-up_RegistrationPage.html>  Learn from industry experts advising on best practices to help you expand your consulting business. - Meet the Independents <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html>  Get a glimpse into the independent workforce in America by reading the profiles and stories of some of our consultants. - Independents Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide>  Take advantage of an online library of articles and resources covering a myriad of topics and issues geared specifically towards the independent career path.
You may also wish to sign-up for our monthly Independent Consulting Brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/mpages/ch-2012-04-01/ic-newsletter.html?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=ICB%2B-%2BMZ%2BTwitter%2BPost&utm_campaign=ICB%2B-%2BMZ%2BTwitter%2BPost> to stay up to date on the many resources that we provide to the consulting marketplace. I wish you every success in growing or starting your own independent consulting business, and if youd like to set up a time to talk to learn more, please feel free to schedule a time <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> that is convenient for you to speak with me. Regards, ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6028 f: 703-793-6070 e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://info.mbopartners.com/SubscriptionManagement.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX57ewoWaC2lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLjNMa5w17gIWRQ%3D></
